Package services

Class PlaylistService

java.lang.Object
services.PlaylistService
public class PlaylistService extends Object

This class contains the method to get the data insert by the user, the method to manipulate the data, and the method to call the factory.

Author:
Diana Cantaluppi, Matr. 744457 Sede Como., Edoardo Ballabio, Matr. 745115 Sede Como.

    • addPlaylist

      public Playlist addPlaylist(String playlistName, Long userId) throws IOException, Exception
      This method creates a new empty playlist naming it with the name passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - The name of the playlist.
      userId - The user's id.
      Returns:
      A Playlist object.
      Throws:
      IOException - This exception is thrown if there is any input/output error.
      Exception - This class indicate conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.

      Exception - This class indicate conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.

      Returns:

    • selectPlaylist

      public Long selectPlaylist(Scanner cmdInput, Map<Long,Playlist> playlistMap)
      This method get and check the data insert by user and give the id of the playlist to select.

      playlistMap - A Map of Playlist.
      Returns:
      The id of the playlist to select
